title: Forgot my Thunderbird Email Password
content: My Thunderbird Email was on auto password sign in when I would boot up, a couple of days while in start up mode on my computer my area had a blackout. When the power supply returned my Thunderbird Email would not start up and requested my password which I have forgot as it is a while since I last used it. Could someone please advise how do I reset my password in Thunderbird... Thank You Derek
creator: Derek_J_Wilson

title: Displayed emails
content:
bold text Previously I put the mouse on bottom of very long list and pushed them up until I had a workable IN BOX list. They were not lost they kept the displayed list the same as I deleted emails after reading.

Barry
creator: vk2aab

title: an email ATTACHMENT I received has disappeared since reading & moving the email to another folder
content: Explain to me how to prevent this from happening.

title: Transfer to new replacement pc
content:
I have installed T'bird in a new replacement pc and also added my two accounts. However, I now need to include my many Local Folders using Profile Folder information from the old pc.

Should I delete all the account information I have installed in my new pc T'bird prior to installing the Profile Folder copy? Thanks Ron
creator: RonSH
